meanings.definition: A character or sequence of characters that marks the beginning or end of a unit of data.
meanings.sent1: The delimiters in the code help identify where each piece of information starts and stops.
meanings.sent2: Make sure to use the correct delimiters when organizing your spreadsheet.
meanings.sent3: The playful delimiters in the storybook made it easy for children to follow along.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter acted as the delimiter between the serious discussion and the light-hearted banter.
meanings.sent5: The bright red delimiters on the map made navigation simple and clear.

meanings.definition: A symbol used to separate or distinguish elements within a set or sequence.
meanings.sent1: The comma is a common delimiter in lists to separate items.
meanings.sent2: The delimiter between the chapters made it easier to find specific sections in the book.
meanings.sent3: The colorful delimiters in the artwork added a unique touch to the overall design.
meanings.sent4: His smile served as a delimiter between his sadness and his true emotions.
meanings.sent5: The fence acted as a delimiter between the two properties, clearly marking the boundary.
